wenekak thaba 2014 wasaredi rajapaksha rejimaya wisin darga nagarayehi athi kala jathiwadi kalabalaya thawath kalu juliyak karawima sandaha ganunu uthsahaya wyartha karana laddeda indran mahatha wisini. 2014 juni masa bodu balasenawe marayin wisin darga nagarayehi kolahalaya athi kala pasuwa edina rathriyehi gotabayage saha basil rajapakshage da anudanuma athiwa ma edina rathriye maha jana sanharayak kirimata salasum sakas keri thibini. 1983 wasare kalu juliyen demala jana sanharaya kala sema rathriyehi bhishanaya wapirimata sudanamin siti namuth ewakata kaluthara pradeshaya bharawa siti indran mahatha wisin widi basina tharamak bodubala senawe dada ballan alla kudu kirima nisa edina salasum kala le wagirima wyartha kerini.

gamak lesa mulinma pihitawanu labu anuradha gramaya 437 di shri lankadipaye raja wu pandukabhaya rajathuma wisin nagarayakata awashya siyalu angopangayan gen samanwitha anuradhapurawaraya bawata diyunu kara goda nanwanu labu bawa mahawanshaye sandahan we.ithihasaya ran kadapathakin pilibimbau karannase anuradhapuraya nam mema aithihasika purawaraya thula sihala kalakaruwage siyumali mata silitu dathin maha gal kanu walata jiwaya laba demin nirmitha aagamika siddhasthana athurin mulasuna hobawamin iparani natabun ha nyashtawashesha bohomayakda, gruha nirmana, maha dagab, samudura paradawana maha warimarga paddhathiyan merata sihala urumaya, sihala raja pelapatha, bauddha hadiyawa aagamika bhakthiya hudi janaya athara pinkethak lesa didulamin anuradhapura punya bhumiya sundara wu lankadwipayata saubhagya kandawamin ha gaurawaya kandawamin siyawas 13 ka pamana kalayak mululle thawamath jiwamanawa babalayi.mese maha kala kethakata urumakam kiyanna wu aithihasika anuradhapura punyabhumiya mita wasara 2500 kata aatha athithaye siddhartha bodhisathwayanta buduwimata pitadun buddhagayawe pihiti jaya shri maha bodhin wahansege dakshina shakhawa anuradhapura mahamewna uyanehi ropanaya kara aththe hudi bauddhayange buddhalambhana pi්rathiya opawath karamini.warthamana samajaya “bo” yanuwen handunwana mema pauranika wrukshaye mulin bhawithakala namaya wanne “ashwaththa” yannayi.
